name: meimei
greetingText: Happiest Birthday to my entire world!!
wishText: Another year older, I wish you happiness in every single day and lots of smile, and wish you all the accomplishment you want. Also I wish my little doctor get into the Uni and major she want. Take care of my gf well!! no getting sick, my gf need to be stronk!. I will always be rooting for you here. Thank you for stay with me all this time and I hope you continue to do so
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
